Graubünden Kantonales Musikfest (Marschmusik) 100 March Contest Graubünden Kantonales Musikfest graubunden-kantonales-musikfest-marschmusik
None
Scuol, GR, Switzerland > held on June 16th & 17th
54 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind)
Aregger, Mühleis (Jury Music) / Fink, Wymann (Jury Discipline)
Winner: Blasorchester FM + Junge Feldmusik Willisau (Wind Band, Gastverein LU), 76.75 Points
Sept. 25, 2012, 6:02 p.m. May 13, 2017, 11:18 a.m.
